entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
